subject: Football
Concussions
Sports Injuries
Interscholastic Athletics
Education (K-12)
lead_paragraph: Prompted by concern about brain injuries, the school board in the city of Marshall, in the gridiron hotbed of East Texas, eliminated the tackle-football program for seventh graders without much protest.
